author: Antoinette Bueno
title: Kate Upton Says There's 'Absolutely' No Pre-Game Sex With Fiance Justin Verlander
text: Kate Upton Says There's 'Absolutely' No Pre-Game Sex With Fiance Justin Verlander by Antoinette Bueno 6:35   Playing Kate Upton Says There's 'Absolutely' No Pre-Game Sex With Fiance Justin Verlander Kate Upton's fiance, professional baseball player Justin Verlander , is drop dead serious when it comes to game day! Upton appeared on Wednesday's Watch What Happens Live with Andy Cohen , where she revealed some intimate details about the couple's sex life. The 24-year-old model says the two don't have sex before his games, or even afterwards, if he played "too well." "There's no sex before a game, absolutely none," Upton says. "And then also what I just found out is, if he plays too well, there's no sex after, either." The blonde bombshell explains that 34-year-old Verlander, who pitches for the Detroit Tigers, is too exhausted after a good game. "Kind of a buzzkill for me," she admits. "I'm like, 'c'mon!'" Upton and Verlander got engaged last year . The Sports Illustrated cover girl says she doesn't want a big wedding. "I want a long wedding, but not a lot of people," she shares. â€¦ And will her famous curves be on display on her big night? When asked by the host to give her thoughts on wedding cleavage, Upton muses, "Hmmm ... I mean, I guess a little?" NEWS: Kate Upton Calls Out Body Shamers While Admitting She Used to Think Baseball Players Were 'Kind of Fat' However, it appears Upton is shaping up to be a low-key bride. Earlier this month, she Instagrammed a short list of what she and Verlander are thinking of including at their nuptials, and it turns out her demands are pretty simple. "Wedding notes: FUN!!! Party! Tequila? Food???" she joked. Watch below:
